TopicTitle: is there a way to edit contracts?

Articles.Content:
I am currently sadden that even though I plan to land on the mun. Bothers me a bit that I wont get a reward. Maybe it will appear on first world record if Landing but I dont know. Just in case.

 

Is there a way I can manually add that contract via my savefile? If its possible, I would love to know.

Yeah with the debug menu/tool, ALT+F12.

https://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/2ln35p/any_way_to_cheat_contracts_through_something_like/

And here it explain roughly how to edit the save regarding to contracts change.

https://gaming.stackexchange.com/questions/232034/how-to-bring-back-mysteriously-missing-contract-in-kerbal

Sorry i'm not elaborate more, i'm on my phone atm

Edited February 3, 2016 by kaptain_kavern
Added another link
I tried the debug ALT+F12 but it seems confusing on the conract menu. I want to add a specific contract, not random generated ones.
